mapper.select:
SELECT f.*, e.attestation, e.agreementUrl, e.create_date FROM tb_worker e JOIN ((SELECT a.worker_id, a.worker_name, a.mobile_code, a.id_card_code, IFNULL(total_order_count,0) AS 'total_order_count', IFNULL(total_money,0) AS 'total_money', IFNULL(many_order_count,0) AS 'many_order_count', IFNULL(many_money,0) AS 'many_money' FROM( SELECT worker_id, worker_name, mobile_code, id_card_code, count(1) AS 'total_order_count', sum(real_money) AS 'total_money' FROM tb_payment_inventory WHERE package_status = 0 AND payment_order_id in
#{item}
GROUP BY worker_id , package_status) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT worker_id, worker_name, mobile_code,id_card_code, count(1) as 'many_order_count', sum(real_money) as 'many_money' FROM tb_payment_inventory WHERE package_status = 1 AND payment_order_id in
#{item}
GROUP BY worker_id , package_status) b ON a.worker_id = b.worker_id ) UNION ( SELECT c.worker_id, c.worker_name, c.mobile_code, c.id_card_code, IFNULL(total_order_count,0) AS 'total_order_count', IFNULL(total_money,0) AS 'total_money', IFNULL(many_order_count,0) AS 'many_order_count', IFNULL(many_money,0) AS 'many_money' FROM ( SELECT worker_id, worker_name, mobile_code, id_card_code, count(1) as 'total_order_count', sum(real_money) as 'total_money' FROM tb_payment_inventory WHERE package_status = 0 AND payment_order_id in
#{item}
GROUP BY worker_id , package_status) c RIGHT JOIN( SELECT worker_id, worker_name, mobile_code, id_card_code,count(1) as 'many_order_count', sum(real_money) as 'many_money' FROM tb_payment_inventory WHERE package_status = 1 AND payment_order_id in
#{item}
GROUP BY worker_id , package_status) d ON c.worker_id = d.worker_id ))f ON e.id =f.worker_id
AND f.worker_id like CONCAR('%',#{workerId},'%')
AND f.worker_name like CONCAR('%',#{workerName},'%')
AND f.id_card_code like CONCAR('%',#{idCardCode},'%')
AND e.create_date like CONCAR('%',#{startDate},'%')
AND e.create_date like CONCAR('%',#{endDate},'%')
